article_title: Israel war cabinet minister vows to quit if there is no post-war plan for Gaza
sentence: Israel's  war  cabinet  was  established  after  Hamas  attacked  Israeli  communities  near  Gaza  on  7  October,  killing  around  1,200  people  and  taking  hostages.

sentence: Israel's  military  campaign  against  Hamas  in  Gaza  has  killed  35,386  people,  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says.
